Articles.Content: Plz help this is frustrating is the any way to recenter a vehicle to the center of the hangar
shift-click to pick up the whole vessel and then you can move
Do you want it perfectly centered? Or just a technique to get it moved back close to the center?
To perfectly center it back, put slightly aside all the vessel's parts other than the root part, then delete the root part, and click whatever part you wish to be the root on the part list.
